text: Flåm is a village in Norway. It is in the municipality of Aurland in Sogn og Fjordane county. The closest airport is Sogndal Airport, Haukåsen, which is about from Flåm. The European route E16 highway between Oslo and Bergen runs through Flåm. ==Population== In 2014, the population was reported to be around 350. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Visit Flåm Category:Villages in Norway Category:Vestland
title: Flåm
